name: Pot Luck 5 Quiz | Mixed 10 Questions | 10 Questions

questions.text: If it is 5 PM US Eastern time, what time is it in London, England?
What is Panama's leading agricultural export?
In which state were America's first log cabins built?
Hadrian's Wall still stands in what country?
What U.S. state has an element named for it?
What cigarette claimed to be 'just a silly millimeter longer'?
Who had the hit 'How Much Is That Doggie In The Window'?
How many blocks long is Wall Street?
questions.explanation:
8.

	Starting from the Southeast end, the road starts at South Street then passes: Front, Water, Pearl, Hanover, William, Broad, New, Broadway.

questions.text: What part of the body does a Rhinologist specialize in?
What card in a deck of Bicycle playing cards features the trademark?
